mapper.select:
select p.person_id,p.person_name,p.person_account,p.person_password,p.person_carnumber, p.person_age,p.person_phone,p.person_address,p.person_recharge,p.person_score,p.person_identity, (select w.worker_name from t_worker as w where w.worker_id=p.worker_id)workerName, (select p2.param_name from t_param p2 where p2.param_value=p.person_sex and p2.param_type='personSex')sexName from t_person p where p.person_identity=0
and p.person_name like concat('%',#{condition.personName},'%')
and p.person_account like concat('%',#{condition.account},'%')
and p.person_phone like concat('%',#{condition.phone},'%')
and p.person_carnumber like concat('%',#{condition.personCarnumber},'%')
limit #{curPage},#{pageSize};

select count(p.person_id) from t_person as p where p.person_identity=0
and p.person_name like concat('%',#{condition.personName},'%')
and p.person_account like concat('%',#{condition.account},'%')
and p.person_phone like concat('%',#{condition.phone},'%')
and p.person_carnumber like concat('%',#{condition.personCarnumber},'%')

select p.person_id,p.person_name,p.person_account,p.person_password,p.person_carnumber, p.person_age,p.person_phone,p.person_address,p.person_recharge,p.person_score,p.person_identity, (select w.worker_name from t_worker as w where w.worker_id=p.worker_id)workerName, (select p2.param_name from t_param p2 where p2.param_value=p.person_sex and p2.param_type='personSex')sexName, (select min(r.record_startime) from t_record as r where p.person_id=r.person_id )recordStartime, (select max(r2.record_endtime) from t_record as r2 where p.person_id=r2.person_id )recordEndtime from t_person p where p.person_identity=1
and p.person_name like concat('%',#{condition.personName},'%')
and p.person_account like concat('%',#{condition.account},'%')
and p.person_phone like concat('%',#{condition.phone},'%')
and p.person_carnumber like concat('%',#{condition.personCarnumber},'%')
GROUP BY p.person_id
limit #{curPage},#{pageSize};

select count(p.person_id) from t_person as p,t_record as r where p.person_id=r.person_id and p.person_identity=1
and p.person_name like concat('%',#{condition.personName},'%')
and p.person_account like concat('%',#{condition.account},'%')
and p.person_phone like concat('%',#{condition.phone},'%')
and p.person_carnumber like concat('%',#{condition.personCarnumber},'%')

select produce_id,produce_name,produce_describe,produce_money,produce_static,produce_months from t_produce where produce_static=(select p.param_value from t_param as p where p.param_type='produceState' and p.param_name='启用')
mapper.update: update t_person set person_recharge=#{personRecharge} where person_id=#{personId}
mapper.select: select record_id,person_id,produce_id,record_startime,record_endtime from t_record as r where r.person_id=#{personId} and #{refundTime}>=r.record_startime
select record_id,person_id,produce_id,record_startime,record_endtime from t_record as r where r.person_id=#{personId} and r.record_startime>=#{refundTime}
select (select datediff(#{refundTime},r.record_startime))dateTime from t_record as r where r.record_id=#{recordId}
mapper.update: update t_person set person_identity=0 ,person_recharge=#{personRecharge} where person_id=#{personId}
